paragraphs.content: Psalm 33
paragraphs.contentHtml: Psalm 33

paragraphs.content: Rejoice in the LORD, O ye righteous: for praise is comely for the upright.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Rejoice in the Lord, O ye righteous: for praise is comely for the upright.

paragraphs.content: Praise the LORD with harp: sing unto him with the psaltery and an instrument of ten strings.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Praise the Lord with harp: sing unto him with the psaltery and an instrument of ten strings.

paragraphs.content: Sing unto him a new song; play skilfully with a loud noise.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Sing unto him a new song; play skilfully with a loud noise.

paragraphs.content: For the word of the LORD is right; and all his works are done in truth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For the word of the Lord is right; and all his works are done in truth.

paragraphs.content: He loveth righteousness and judgment: the earth is full of the goodness of the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He loveth righteousness and judgment: the earth is full of the goodness of the Lord.

paragraphs.content: By the word of the LORD were the heavens made; and all the host of them by the breath of his mouth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: By the word of the Lord were the heavens made; and all the host of them by the breath of his mouth.

paragraphs.content: He gathereth the waters of the sea together as an heap: he layeth up the depth in storehouses.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He gathereth the waters of the sea together as an heap: he layeth up the depth in storehouses.

paragraphs.content: Let all the earth fear the LORD: let all the inhabitants of the world stand in awe of him.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let all the earth fear the Lord: let all the inhabitants of the world stand in awe of him.

paragraphs.content: For he spake, and it was done; he commanded, and it stood fast.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For he spake, and it was done; he commanded, and it stood fast.

paragraphs.content: The LORD bringeth the counsel of the heathen to nought: he maketh the devices of the people of none effect.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord bringeth the counsel of the heathen to nought: he maketh the devices of the people of none effect.

paragraphs.content: The counsel of the LORD standeth for ever, the thoughts of his heart to all generations.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The counsel of the Lord standeth for ever, the thoughts of his heart to all generations.

paragraphs.content: Blessed is the nation whose God is the LORD; and the people whom he hath chosen for his own inheritance.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Blessed is the nation whose God is the Lord; and the people whom he hath chosen for his own inheritance.

paragraphs.content: The LORD looketh from heaven; he beholdeth all the sons of men.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord looketh from heaven; he beholdeth all the sons of men.

paragraphs.content: From the place of his habitation he looketh upon all the inhabitants of the earth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: From the place of his habitation he looketh upon all the inhabitants of the earth.

paragraphs.content: He fashioneth their hearts alike; he considereth all their works.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He fashioneth their hearts alike; he considereth all their works.

paragraphs.content: There is no king saved by the multitude of an host: a mighty man is not delivered by much strength.
paragraphs.contentHtml: There is no king saved by the multitude of an host: a mighty man is not delivered by much strength.

paragraphs.content: An horse is a vain thing for safety: neither shall he deliver any by his great strength.
paragraphs.contentHtml: An horse is a vain thing for safety: neither shall he deliver any by his great strength.

paragraphs.content: Behold, the eye of the LORD is upon them that fear him, upon them that hope in his mercy;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Behold, the eye of the Lord is upon them that fear him, upon them that hope in his mercy;

paragraphs.content: To deliver their soul from death, and to keep them alive in famine.
paragraphs.contentHtml: To deliver their soul from death, and to keep them alive in famine.

paragraphs.content: Our soul waiteth for the LORD: he is our help and our shield.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Our soul waiteth for the Lord: he is our help and our shield.

paragraphs.content: For our heart shall rejoice in him, because we have trusted in his holy name.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For our heart shall rejoice in him, because we have trusted in his holy name.

paragraphs.content: Let thy mercy, O LORD, be upon us, according as we hope in thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let thy mercy, O Lord, be upon us, according as we hope in thee.
